TopicTitle: Increasingly long transition times, log spam

Articles.Content:
As title says, I can play for a while without issue, but i'm getting longer and longer transitioning times betweens scenes, until the game seems to be basically stuck during loading.

Notably, these lines are constantly spammed, especially before/while the game is stuck: 

ScaleModList: listSize 492 maxListSize 1713
 
(Filename: C:/buildslave/unity/build/artifacts/generated/common/runtime/UnityEngineDebugBindings.gen.cpp Line: 64)

Also, the second part is spammed during the whole game, so i'm not sure if its actually an issue.

Heavily modded Realism Overhault install with RSS and RP0.

 

Not the most critical of problems when you can play 2+ hours before the issue occurs, but loading times do increase over time. So if anyone can help me figure out stuff (or tell me the message means nothing), I'd be very thankfull!
